text:
Tradeshift | San Francisco, CA & Bucharest, RO | Backend Engineer, Frontend Engineer, AppSec Engineer, DevOps, SRE | Full-time | Onsite | tradeshift.com

Tradeshift is the business commerce company, and leader in supply chain payments. Get your supply chain connected to the future with digital marketplaces, payments, and apps. Tradeshift connects over 1.5 million companies across 190 countries, processing over half a trillion USD in transaction value, and its supply chain marketplaces contain more than 35 million SKUs.

We have recently raised $250M USD in our Series E round and have reached unicorn valuation.

Openings
